body.name: P2 Trio 3 Channel 4K WiFi Dash Cam, 4K+1080P+1080P Front and Rear Inside Triple Car Camera, Free 64GB Card, 5G Wi-Fi Dual DashCam, IR Night Vision, Voice Control, GPS, 24H Parking Mode
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 36 mins
features: 4K 3 Channel Dash Cam - Enhance your driving experience with our 2.35'' high-resolution IPS display screen, ensuring exceptional picture quality. This dash cam offers 4K+1080P+1080P recording, allowing simultaneous monitoring of your car's front, interior, and rear, providing valuable evidence for insurance claims and disputes

Infrared Night Vision - With 4 infrared LED lights, the interior camera automatically adjusts between day and night mode, ensuring crystal-clear visibility all day. Equipped with WDR in the front camera, the dash camera maintains excellent exposure balance in both bright and dim light, resulting in superior recording quality always

5GHz Wi-Fi & OTA Firmware Update - The 5G Wi-Fi feature of the dashcam provides fast and stable connectivity, allowing for smooth streaming of videos with no buffering. The "Pelsee Cam" App allows you to easily playback, download, edit, share, and GPS track inquiries of recorded videos. Additionally, it also supports OTA (Over-the-Air) firmware updates for enhanced performance

4K + 1080P Dual Dash Camera - The dashcam's dual-camera feature allows you to use the front and rear cameras or the front and interior cameras with a resolution of 4K+1080P, ensuring top-quality images and videos. At the touch of a button, you can switch off the interior camera and microphone, guaranteeing your privacy. Ideal for taxis, Uber, Lyft, ride-hailing services, and families

Effortless Voice Control - Control the car camera effortlessly using your voice. With 8 voice commands, you can start or turn off recording, capture still photos, and more, all without the need for manual adjustments while driving, ensuring a safer and more convenient journey

7/24 Parking Monitor - Our dash cam offers all-the-day parking monitoring, ensuring your vehicle is protected day and night. The time-lapse recording efficiently compresses video footage, conserving power and storage space without compromising security. An extra ACC hardwire kit is needed for this function

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars value for money
reviews.reviewText: This is a good car recorder, quite high-end, the picture is very clear and can record every detail. It has a lot of features, 5GHz Wi-Fi, OTA Firmware Update, Voice Control, 3-Channel Recording, Dual Dash Cam Mode, G-Sensor, Loop Recording, GPS Tracking, IR Lights Night Vision, WDR, 24H Parking Monitor, Time-Lapse Recording, that make recording more convenient and accurate. And the installation is very easy, value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: The 3 Channel 4K WiFi Dash Cam really caught my eye with its crystal-clear 4K resolution and the fact that it covers all angles with front, rear, and interior cameras. What's super handy is the WiFi connectivity, making it a breeze to access footage straight from your smartphone. But, I gotta say, it's a bit on the larger side, and you might notice it hanging there. On the bright side, setting it up is a piece of cake, and it's user-friendly all the way.The camera's built tough, and the night vision is pretty impressive. The only hiccup is dealing with those high-res recordings – they're fantastic, but the file sizes mean you've got to stay on top of memory management. Despite that little snag, it's a powerhouse when it comes to keeping an eye on your ride.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: The pictures are really high quality and have a wide view. I like the night vision. Also this cam is easy to install and I actually like its simple and beautiful package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seamless Installation and Excellent Value - A Great Dashboard Camera
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this dashboard camera, and I'm thoroughly impressed with its overall quality and functionality. Right out of the box, the camera's packaging was both sleek and secure, ensuring the product was well-protected during shipping. One of the standout features of this camera is the clarity of the instructions provided. Setting it up was a breeze, thanks to the straightforward and easy-to-follow manual. Even for me who isn't particularly tech-savvy, the installation process was hassle-free.Another significant advantage of this camera is the inclusion of a very long cable. This was particularly beneficial as it allowed for a clean and tidy installation in my car.Moreover, the camera came with an SD card included. This was a pleasant surprise and a great value-add, as it meant I could use the camera straight away without needing to make an additional purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very fast delivery! Installed directly above the front windshield, It can record a very wide field of vision! The picture quality is great. They also gave screen protective films，Very sweet.What impresses me most is that when download its app, it can be easily connected to the mobile phone wirelessly, and just easily download the driving images or videos. It's really convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the best affordable dash cam you can get here
reviews.reviewText: Thrilled with my new dash cam! Easy setup, top-notch video quality, and a compact design. The wide-angle lens and rear camera make it a perfect safety companion. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Quality Dash Cam for Added Peace of Mind
reviews.reviewText: This dash cam exceeded all my expectations! Right out of the box, its weightiness instilled an immediate sense of security. Firstly, its sleek design seamlessly blends into my car interior, giving it a high-end feel.Moreover, the video quality is superb, capturing clear footage even in low-light or adverse weather conditions, perfect for recording crucial moments while driving. I particularly appreciate its wide-angle lens, ensuring comprehensive coverage of my surroundings, enhancing my confidence on the road.This dash cam is hands down the best I've ever owned. Top-notch quality, robust features, and it provides me with an extra layer of reassurance and safety while behind the wheel. Highly recommended to anyone in need!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This dash cam is a reliable choice for those seeking comprehensive coverage on the road. With this dual-camera setup, it captures both the road ahead and the interior cabin, making it suitable for ride share drivers and personal use alike. Its night vision capability excel, proving clear images even in low light conditions. The compact design and easy installation further enhance its appeal. Plus it comes with a memory card inside Overall it offers impressive performance and features, making it a worthy investment for those prioritizing safety and security on the road.

reviews.reviewTitle: Must read - excellent in car recording
reviews.reviewText: I bought this car dash cam for my ride share services. The most important thing is not only have cameras facing front and rear bust also need to have a recording camera inside the car to protect my self and customers. The inside camera is hang over the rear view mirror. It could record both video and audio. There is a button under the camera that I could turn off the inside camera recording easily. So it is a triple camera dash cam. Both of the camera has very good video recording quality. The video image is crystal clear and even at night. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Comprehensive Protection and Clarity: Pelsee P2 Trio 3 Channel 4K WiFi Dash Cam Review
reviews.reviewText: The Pelsee P2 Trio 3 Channel 4K WiFi Dash Cam stands out as a comprehensive and high-resolution solution for all-round vehicle surveillance. Boasting a triple-camera system with 4K+1080P+1080P resolution for front, inside, and rear recording, this device ensures you capture every angle and detail of your driving experience.The 4K front camera delivers stunningly clear visuals, enabling crisp and detailed footage of the road ahead. Simultaneously, the 1080P inside and rear cameras provide comprehensive coverage within the vehicle and behind, guaranteeing a complete view of your surroundings.One remarkable feature is the IR night vision capability, ensuring clear recording even in low-light conditions. This technology enhances safety and security during nighttime drives, capturing crucial details that might be missed by standard dash cams.The integration of 5G Wi-Fi and GPS further elevates its functionality. The 5G Wi-Fi enables faster and more stable connectivity, facilitating easy access to footage through the dedicated app. Meanwhile, the GPS accurately records location and speed data, adding an extra layer of information to recorded videos.Voice control simplifies operation, allowing hands-free management of the dash cam while driving. Additionally, the 24-hour parking mode ensures constant monitoring of your vehicle, providing peace of mind even when you're away.The inclusion of a free 64GB card adds value to the package, removing the need for immediate additional purchases and allowing for extensive video storage right out of the box.While the Pelsee P2 Trio boasts an array of impressive features, it's important to note the necessity of a robust and consistent power supply for optimal performance.In conclusion, the Pelsee P2 Trio 3 Channel 4K WiFi Dash Cam offers a comprehensive, high-resolution, and feature-rich solution for motorists seeking enhanced safety and surveillance while on the road. Its versatile triple-camera system, night vision capabilities, connectivity options, and thoughtful extras make it a worthy investment for those prioritizing comprehensive vehicle monitoring.Pros:Triple-camera system with high-resolution recordingIR night vision for clear footage in low-light conditions5G Wi-Fi and GPS integration for enhanced connectivity and data accuracyVoice control for hands-free operation24H parking mode for continuous monitoringFree 64GB card includedCons:Reliant on a consistent power supply for optimal performance

Got this dash cam to replace my old one. It's such an amazing product 😍. It's really easy to install, and has an ads-free app provides instant access to all footages. With the 4k main camera, and the 1080k back camera, it captures every detail on the road. Also has the night vision but haven't try that. The build-in wifi allow me to access the cam via the app easily. Overall, it's a reliable dash cam on the road. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: This WiFi Car Dash Camera is perfect choice for anyone to enhance their driving experience.
reviews.reviewText: The video quality is impressive, capturing clear footage even in low-light conditions. The wide-angle lens ensures a broad field of view, minimizing blind spots and capturing crucial details on the road.One of its standout features is the WiFi connectivity. The ability to connect to the camera via a smartphone app is incredibly convenient. Viewing live footage, adjusting settings, and downloading recordings can be easily done through the app.

reviews.reviewTitle: An excellent aid for families with children, adequate memory
reviews.reviewText: We have a one-year-old baby. When I drive, I cannot see my baby at the back (in his car seat), which makes me worried. This dash cam is of great help, as now I can see the back of my car and other angles freely. The dash cam is of good quality; people, cars, and other surroundings can be seen very clearly in real-time. Switching to different modes is easy. The provided memory is sufficient, so I do not have concerns about storage. I think that it is a great deal, especially for families with little kids.
